title: Moshav Amirim Village
description: Cooperative community of farmers (moshav) established since 1958 by a group of vegetarians who banded together to create a moshav based on a vegetarian, vegan, and organic lifestyle and ideology. Today around 150 families live on the moshav, they run guesthouses and restaurants that are open to the public. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amirim
